snippet: Mayor Cory Booker, who is seeking a United States Senate seat in New Jersey, should disclose the full details of his involvement in an Internet start-up.
abstract: Editorial asserts Newark Mayor Cory Booker, who is running for the Senate, has obligation to give a full and personal accounting of his involvement in an Internet start-up that he formed with the help of several high-powered investors from Silicon Valley; warns Booker that he must make certain his connections do not create a conflict or an appearance of conflict should he win the senate campaign.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Cory Booker, who is seeking a United States Senate seat in New Jersey, should disclose the full details of his involvement in an Internet start-up.
